price: Tàbí wọn kò fún un ní ìró ohun tó wà nínú tírà (Ànábì) Mūsā ni,
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
